Package it.polimi.ingsw.View.ReducedModel

Class RedLeaderCard

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.View.ReducedModel.RedLeaderCard
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
LeaderCard
public class RedLeaderCard
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
There are 4 types of Leader Card, depending on the type of special effect they apply on the Game. All of them have the following attributes: a CardId for identification, victoryPoints for the score. Type is a byte identifying the type
See Also:
